alert.note: Alert for Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 9:27PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Big Horn, southeastern Musselshell and central Yellowstone Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 927 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Roundup to 18 miles southeast of Lockwood. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hardin, Melstone, Shepherd, Huntley, Worden, Ballantine, Musselshell and Pompeys Pillar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone
